ActJudges Act
SubjectLorraine Bethell ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Edward D. Bayda
PrecisGranting of an annuity to LORRAINE BETHELL, widow of the Honourable Edward D. Bayda, Chief Justice of the Court of Appeal for Saskatchewan, effective April 3, 2010.
AttachmentsAttachment
